title: Lean snail meat

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lean snail meat are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking lean snails on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 17 Cooking and granting 80 experience when successful. Players may burn the snail while cooking one, resulting in a burnt snail; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning at level 47 on a fire or level 50 on a range. Lean snail meat heals 5-8 Hitpoints.

Lean snail meat

Advanced data
Item ID3371

Lean snail meat are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking lean snails on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 17 Cooking and granting 80 experience when successful. Players may burn the snail while cooking one, resulting in a burnt snail; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning at level 47 on a fire or level 50 on a range. Lean snail meat heals 5-8 Hitpoints.

Lean snail meat has an unusual burn rate. When cooking on a fire, players stop burning them at level 47. However, on a cooking range, where it is expected that the burn chance is further reduced, players may still burn them until level 50.

It will stop burning at level 47 on a fire or level 50 on a range. Lean snail meat heals 5-8 [[Hitpoints]]. Lean snail meat has an unusual [[burn rate]]. When cooking on a fire, players stop burning them at level 47. However, on a [[cooking range]], where it is expected that the burn chance is further reduced, players may still burn them until level 50. ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Cooking |skill1lvl = 17 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 80 |members = Yes |ticks = 1 |ticksnote = Increases to 4 with the use of the Make-X functionality. |facilities = Cooking range |mat1 = Lean snail |output1 = Lean snail meat }} ===Cooking chance=== {{Skilling success chart|label=Lean snail meat cooking chance |label1=Fire|low1=93|high1=444|req1=17|color1=orange|image1=Firemaking icon.png |label2=Range|low2=85|high2=428|req2=17|color2=saddlebrown|image2=Cooking range icon.png |label3=Lumbridge range|low3=95|high3=448|req3=17|color3=green|image3=Lumbridge Teleport.png |label4=Hosidius +5%|low4=97|high4=440|req4=17|color4=red|image4=Cooking range icon.png |label5=Hosidius +10%|low5=110|high5=453|req5=79|color5=blue|image5=Cooking range icon.png }} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |daterange = 5 July –
